{{Description|A monster created by the sedimentation of Hydro dispersed throughout nature.<br />A larger and more powerful Hydro Slime that can create bubbles to entrap its enemies. It is said that they can grow to truly staggering sizes if given an energy-rich environment. Eyewitnesses have supposedly seen Hydro Slimes as large as a small mound in Wolvendom.|[[Archive]]}}

==Abilities and Attacks==
*'''Wet Application:''' When attacked, the Hydro Slime applies the {{Color|Wet}} Status for 10 seconds to all players and enemies in a '''2m''' radius.
*'''Bump:''' Bumps into the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}.
*'''Leap:''' Jumps high into the air before slamming down at the player's location, dealing '''300% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Hydro DMG}}.
** Certain enhanced Large Hydro Slimes, found in certain [[Domains]], [[Spiral Abyss]], overworld events and challenges, have reduced [[Cooldown]] on this attack.
*'''Bubble Spit:''' Launches a [[Bubbles|bubble]] in a high arc at the target.
**Upon contact with a player, the bubble deals '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}, temporarily trapping and immobilizing the player.
**Upon contact with another enemy, temporarily traps and immobilizes the enemy, or simply pops if the enemy is too large to be trapped.
